column10: Intersection of Monument Drive Westbound (end)  and Fairfax County Parkway on ramp northbound. Drivers turning right do not observe the pedestrian crossing 50 percent of the time.
column21: Drivers are simply not observing the pedestrian light at all. They look to the left and turn right at speed without looking for or observing foot or bicycle traffic crossing the intersection.
